channel.title: [PI] Summoning Familiar Following Problem
channel.description:
So whenever i have my summoning familiar it will tele to me once we go a certain distance apart. Now when it get stuck behind things it tele's to me and another one stays where it got stuck and if anyone interacts with it, it crashes the server. Is there a way to make summoning familiars noclip through things so this problem can stop?
Please help
